message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice, considering the risk of inflation.
I'm willing to take a slightly lower share to avoid a long negotiation, but I think this is a fair starting point.
Considering the inflation rate and aiming for a balanced division, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice.
I'm willing to compromise on the split, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the risks I'm taking.
